issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Console flags AWS::EC2::InternetGateway as unsupported resource, does not let the user create stack

comments.body:
I went through an exercise to see what else we should be supporting by looking through tickets. These did not come up, but we exclude all of them:
            'AWS::EC2::VPCPeeringConnection',
            'AWS::EC2::VPCConnection',
            'AWS::EC2::VPCConnectionRoute',
            'AWS::EC2::VPCGateway',
            'AWS::EC2::VPCGatewayRoutePropagation',

[~ethomas], are these supported by the CF code?

More properties we also flag:
            {'resource': 'AWS::EC2::Instance', 'properties': [
                'NetworkInterfaces', 'SecurityGroupIds', 'SourceDestCheck', 'Tenancy'
            ]},
            {'resource': 'AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup', 'properties': [
                'SecurityGroupEgress', 'Tags', 'VpcId'
            ]},
            {'resource': 'AWS::EC2::SecurityGroupIngress', 'properties': [
                'SourceSecurityGroupId'
            ]},
 I suspect Tenancy is not supported, but how about the rest?

[~dkavanagh] some of the list of resources you described are incorrectly named.  But for the record we do not support 

AWS::EC2::VPCEndpoint
AWS::EC2::VPCPeeringConnection
AWS::EC2::VPNConnection
AWS::EC2::VPNConnectionRoute
AWS::EC2::VPNGateway
AWS::EC2::VPNGatewayRoutePropagation

(note some VPN and not VPC).

In terms of the rest:  instance does support network interfaces, security group ids and source dest check, and all properties on security group and security group ingress that you mentioned are also supported.  I don't know if the backend supports tenancy but we parse it and forward it to the back end, so I wouldn't flag it.

Thanks [~ethomas]. Would you mind reviewing this PR to make sure the changes look good to you?

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/2018
Thanks [~dkavanagh] for lining up a fix!
See attached screenshot.  Using the above template, I get this error.
[~alice], can you test this again please? I'm not sure why Adam and I see different results.

I built custom packages from GUI-2694 branch and tested with the following package install on UFS of a VPC cloud: http://ci.eucalyptus.com/job/p2-console-build-custom/19/artifact/packages/rhel/7/x86_64/eucaconsole-4.2.2-0.9479.19.git530b62c.el7.noarch.rpm

I tested both in IE11/Windows7 and Firefox/OSX in both cases i get an AWS  template detected dialog !Screen Shot 2016-06-29 at 2.40.24 PM.png|thumbnail! , which, after hitting "OK" lets the stack creation proceed. 

Same template was used from URL:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eucalyptus/nephoria/master/nephoria/testcases/cloudformation/vpc_templates/cfn-euca10020-template.json

Alice had good luck w/ packages built from the branch. Maybe your review could be just code? :-) We can screen-share to see what's up with yours if you like.

Plus, I'd still like for [~ethomas] to look the list over in code, now that I think it's up to date. :-)
[~dkavanagh]Fix looks good for me.  However, we do also support allocationId, networkInterfaceId and privateIpAddress on EIPAssociation, at least at the CF level.
Confirmed.  Pointed source install to shared setup.  Created stack successfully after being warned that an AWS template was detected.

Verified 'AWS::EC2::InternetGateway' is no longer flagged as an unsupported resource (although EC2::EIP Domain is now flagged using the sample temple provided in this ticket's description).

Verified on: shared setup (region-one) - https://g-05-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
Account: kamalgill/admin
Tested on: Chrome (incognito mode) Version 51.0.2704.84 (64-bit)
Tested on: IE 11 on Windows 8.1 (Version 11.0.9600.18350)
Release: 0.9494.206.git085446d.el7
